channel.title: Gauntlet Podcast: Nahual, Lighthearted, Amber
channel.description:
In this episode we officially welcome our new co-host, @Sarah. Together with @Auzumel_S and I, the three of us plan to alternate hosting duties so no one person is on every episode. If you have a project or thing you want to talk about, reach out to us about being a guest. The only requirement is that you talk about a Gauntlet Hangouts game you ran or played the previous month.
This episode features @Kurt_Potts' new game, *Lighthearted* . It also looks at how setting informs play in *Nahual* by @miguelmx. The guest segment has us talking about playing historical games. Give it a listen and please reshare liberally!
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/nahual-lighthearted-amber
